mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_type(name) SELECT #{name} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM product_type WHERE name=#{name})
mapper.update: UPDATE product_type SET name=#{name} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM product_type WHERE name LIKE #{key}
SELECT * FROM product_type WHERE name LIKE #{key} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{firstResult}, #{pageSize}
